column1: In terms of Section 12 (3) of the Ordinance,  "Every Commissioner before whom any oath

or  affirmation 
is  administered,  or  before  whom  any  affidavit 
is  taken  under  this
Ordinance, shall state truly in the jurat or attestation at what place and on what date the

same  was  administered  or 
taken,  and  shall 
initial  all  alterations,  erasures,  and

interlineations  appearing  on  the 
face  thereof  and  made  before  the  same  was  so
